item.title: First Post
item.description: Introduction Welcome to my first blog post! In this post, I will share my journey and experiences in cloud computing. What is Cloud Computing? Cloud computing is the delivery of computing services over the internet. It allows for on-demand access to resources like storage, processing power, and applications. Benefits of Cloud Computing Scalability: Easily scale resources up or down based on demand. Cost Efficiency: Pay only for what you use, reducing capital expenditure.
